alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bexar; Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:18AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Karnes, central Atascosa, southwestern Wilson and south central Bexar Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 218 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pleasanton to near Campbellton. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Floresville, Jourdanton, Poth, Christine, Campbellton, Elmendorf, Falls City, Cestohowa, Leming, Sandy Oaks, Paweleville, Canada Verde, Graytown, Fashing, Coughran, Hobson, Peggy, Espey and Deweesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
